combo.assistance_dql: SELECT DISTINCT dv_device_family FROM cd_product_info WHERE a_status != 'Inactive' AND dv_device_family != ' ' ORDER BY 1
SELECT DISTINCT dv_device_subfamily FROM cd_product_info WHERE a_status != 'Inactive' AND dv_device_family = '$value(dv_device_family)' AND dv_device_subfamily != ' ' ORDER BY 1

list.assistance_dql: SELECT DISTINCT dv_device_code FROM cd_product_info WHERE a_status != 'Inactive' AND dv_device_family = '$value(dv_device_family)' AND dv_device_subfamily = '$value(dv_device_subfamily)' AND ANY dv_device_code != ' ' ORDER BY 1 enable (ROW_BASED)

text.validation_message_en: Special characters, leading and trailing spaces must not be used.

combo.assistance_taxonomy: Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region
Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region
Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region

combo.assistance_dql: select v.alias_value, v.locale_value from d2_dictionary d , d2_dictionary_value v where v.object_name like '%$value(country_code)' and d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name ='Medical Device Notified Bodies' and d.alias_name= 'Notified Body Code' and v.i_position = d.i_position ORDER BY locale_value enable (ROW_BASED)

comment.label_en: Note: Changes to these settings will not affect existing documents - they will only apply to new documents.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_managers') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_managers') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_managers')

comment.label_en: These users will be responsible for managing properties in this form.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory')

comment.label_en: These users will be able to read this form and create documents related to this Regulatory Application, and assign documents to this Regulatory Application.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_submission_mgrs') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_submission_mgrs') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_submission_mgrs')

comment.label_en: These users can read and manage access to imported submissions of this application by default.
Access to individual submissions can be restricted via the Submission Registration Form settings, where necessary.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_submission_users') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_submission_users') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_submission_users')

comment.label_en: These users can read imported submission folders and documents for this application by default.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_coordinators') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_coordinators') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_coordinators')

comment.label_en: These users have the ability to manually change the status of documents created in relation to this application.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_reviewers') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_reviewers') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_reviewers')

comment.label_en: These users will be prepopulated as Reviewers and/or co-Authors on Collaborative and Review workflows for documents created in relation to this Regulatory Application.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_approvers') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_approvers') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_approvers')

comment.label_en: These users will be prepopulated as Approvers on workflows for documents created in relation to this Regulatory Application.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_readers') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_readers') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_readers')

comment.label_en: These users will have Read Only Access to finalized documents created in relation to this Regulatory Application.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_auditors') union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_auditors') union select group_name from dm_group where group_name IN ('cd_md_regulatory_doc_auditors')

comment.label_en: These users are responsible for carrying out internal audits on documents related to this device.
Note: Changes to these settings will not affect existing documents - they will only apply to new documents.
